SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Factories.Interfaces

Interface UIControlFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
UIControlFactoryImpl
public interface UIControlFactory
The UIControlFactory interface defines methods for creating various UI controls.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    javafx.scene.control.Button
    createButton(String text, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> action)
    Creates a new Button with the specified text and action.

    Creates a new Label with the specified text and style classes.
    javafx.scene.control.Button

    Creates a new menu Button with the specified text and action.

    createSlider(double min, double max, double value, double width)
    Creates a new Slider with the specified minimum, maximum, value, and width.

    createToggleButton(boolean selected)
    Creates a new ToggleButton with the specified initial selection state.

  • Method Details

    • createLabel

      javafx.scene.control.Label createLabel(String text, String... styleClasses)
      Creates a new Label with the specified text and style classes.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed on the label.
      styleClasses - The style classes to be applied to the label.
      Returns:
      A new Label object.

    • createButton

      javafx.scene.control.Button createButton(String text, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> action)
      Creates a new Button with the specified text and action.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed on the button.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      A new Button object.

    • createSlider

      javafx.scene.control.Slider createSlider(double min, double max, double value, double width)
      Creates a new Slider with the specified minimum, maximum, value, and width.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value of the slider.
      max - The maximum value of the slider.
      value - The initial value of the slider.
      width - The width of the slider.
      Returns:
      A new Slider object.

    • createToggleButton

      javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton createToggleButton(boolean selected)
      Creates a new ToggleButton with the specified initial selection state.
      Parameters:
      selected - The initial selection state of the toggle button.
      Returns:
      A new ToggleButton object.

    • createMenuButton

      javafx.scene.control.Button createMenuButton(String text, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> action)
      Creates a new menu Button with the specified text and action.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed on the button.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      A new Button object.
